name: aweigh
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a ship's anchor) lifted off the sea bed: With a cry of "Anchors aweigh!" they prepared to set sail.
More examplesFewer examplesThey shouted things like "Anchors aweigh!" and "Ship ahoy!"An anchor that is aweigh is one that has just begun to pull on the rope or chain as it is being hauled in.
